profile:
Adanac is dedicated to providing its customers with quality roofing and aluminum gutter services backed by strong workmanship and material warranties! Adanac’s roofing capabilities encompass virtually all forms of steep-slope and flat roofing.

We strive to offer our customers the highest level of customer service in an effort to maintain a strong referral base. In doing this, we have succeeded in becoming one of the lower mainland's premier roofing companies.

 Adanac Roofing Supply and Install IKO, CertainTeed and Malarkey asphalt shingles. Synthetic product we supply and Install Davinci,Enviroshake and all types of metal roofs along with Cedar shakes.

profile:
Canuck Roofing has been in business for 10 years and has been steadily growing ever since the start.
 
Canuck Roofing has a 5-million dollar liability insurance coverage. We are part of the Condominium Home Owners Association of BC, have an A+ rating with the Better Business Bureau, over 20 5-star reviews on Google, and Goldstar clearance with WorkSafeBC. 
We can be found on Homestars, Angie’s List, Houzz, Facebook, Instagram and Twitter.
 
Give us a call to book your inspection.
products: IKO, Soprema, GAF, Owens Corning, Malarkey, CertainTeed.
services: Roof Replacement, Roof Repairs, Roof Inspection and Maintenance
warranty_terms: Yes. Kindly ask for details. Depends on the project completed. Between 10-20 years.
